Bella Paloma Recipe | Bon Appetit




















































Close Menu IconLoginRecipesCookingCultureShoppingRestaurantsBA MarketVideosPodcastSubscribe to our newsletterSign UpPrivacy and user agreementMain Navigation IconBA LogoBon appetitLoginrecipesBella PalomaFacebookPinterestTwitterEmailA summer favorite gets an Italian twist featuring apéritif and Don Julio Reposado.PrintIngredients1.5 ounces Don Julio Reposado1 grapefruit1 ounce Italian apéritif1 Tsp. granulated sugar2 ounces seltzer1 Tbsp. lime juiceIceKosher saltRecipe PreparationSlice a thin round from the grapefruit. Slice the round in half (into a half moon). Juice remaining grapefruit.Pour kosher salt on a plate. Rub half of the rim of a highball glass with one of the slices. Dip rim of glass in salt. Fill glass with ice.Add 1.5 ounces of Don Julio Reposado tequila.Add 2 ounces of grapefruit juice and 1 ounce of Italian apéritif.Juice the lime into the glass (should be 1 tablespoon juice) and add sugar.Stir vigorously and strain tequila mixture into prepared glass.Top off with seltzer.
